page.title: 16An outdoor game for girls
page.content: The game 'elastic' is usually a girl's game. A long piece of elastic tied to make a loop is required. The game is for three or more children. Two stand a short distance from each other with their feet apart and the elastic stretched around their ankles.The others take in turn to jump in and out of the elastic.The two with the elastic then put their feet together and the others repeat the jumps. The ones with the elastic then remove one leg from the loop and the jumps are repeated. For the final jump of the first round the two stand with their feet as wide apart as possible. For the second round the elastic is moved up to the knees and all jumps repeated then the elastic is moved up to the thighs. You are out if you stand on the elastic or miss a jump.
